author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the unused 
```
MFGeometryFileRcd | 130503 | MFGeometry_130503
MFGeometryFileRcd | 120812 | MFGeometry_120812
```
tags from all GTs. These tags have been superseded a long time ago by 
```
MFGeometryFileRcd | 90322 | MFGeometry_90322
MFGeometryFileRcd | 160812 | MFGeometry_160812
```
but have never been removed from the GTs. See the request in [1] and the diffs in [2], they only show these 2 tags.

[1] 
https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4450.html

[2] 
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/121X_mcRun1_design_v1/121X_mcRun1_design_v2

title: Remove unused magnetic field geometry tags from all GTs
